channel.title: CVE Feed for Alexander Stokmann -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Alexander Stokmann -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-29436|2024-09-16T18:08:01.838Z -- alexander%20stokmann -- code%20snippets%20extended%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Persistent Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Alexander Stokmann's Code Snippets Extended plugin <= 1.4.7 on WordPress via Cross-Site Request Forgery (vulnerable parameters &title, &snippet_code).

item.title: CVE-2022-29429|2024-09-16T19:45:41.855Z -- alexander%20stokmann -- code%20snippets%20extended%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Remote Code Execution (RCE) in Alexander Stokmann's Code Snippets Extended plugin <= 1.4.7 on WordPress via Cross-Site Request Forgery.

item.title: CVE-2022-29435|2024-09-16T16:52:54.361Z -- alexander%20stokmann -- code%20snippets%20extended%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Alexander Stokmann's Code Snippets Extended plugin <= 1.4.7 on WordPress allows an attacker to delete or to turn on/off snippets.
